summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of POS UI improvements. All 6 features tested and working correctly: Cobro dialog with dual panels, bill buttons calculation, change calculation, TICKETS/GUARDAR button logic, hamburger menu sidebar, and blue color theme.

issues: Console warnings about missing DialogTitle and aria-describedby for accessibility - not blocking but should be addressed for screen reader users

passed_tests: TEST 1: COBRAR Dialog (Desktop) - Shows 2 panels (Recibo left, Pago right) with total, bill buttons, payment methods
TEST 2: Bill Buttons Calculation - For total $101.50, buttons correctly show $102, $105, $110, $120
TEST 2: Bill Buttons Calculation - For total $1.50, buttons correctly show $2, $5, $10, $20
TEST 3: Change Calculation - Entering $150 for $101.50 total shows 'Cambio a devolver: $48.50'
TEST 4: TICKETS button visible when cart is empty (Desktop)
TEST 4: GUARDAR button visible when cart has products (Desktop)
TEST 4: TICKETS button visible when cart is empty (Mobile)
TEST 4: GUARDAR button visible when cart has products (Mobile)
TEST 4: Mobile article counter badge shows correct quantity
TEST 5: Hamburger menu opens sidebar with options (Despejar, Dividir, Combinar, Sincronizar)
TEST 5: Sidebar hidden by default - only visible via hamburger menu
TEST 6: Blue color theme applied - bg-blue-600 on headers, buttons, accents
TEST 7: No email option in payment dialog - verified on both desktop and mobile
TEST 8: Payment methods (Efectivo, Tarjeta) displayed correctly
critical_code_review_comments: Bill button calculation logic is correct: Math.ceil(total), Math.ceil(total/5)*5, Math.ceil(total/10)*10, Math.ceil(total/20)*20
Layout.js correctly accepts hideSidebar prop to hide sidebar and header for POS page
POS.js has its own blue header with hamburger menu that opens internal sidebar
Mobile bottom bar correctly switches between TICKETS and GUARDAR based on cart state
Accessibility warning: DialogContent missing DialogTitle - should add VisuallyHidden title for screen readers
seed_data_creation: None - used existing products (Coca Cola $1.50, p2 $100.00, p3 $10.00)

Bill buttons are dynamically calculated based on total. Change calculation works correctly. TICKETS/GUARDAR button logic works on both desktop and mobile.
